item.title: About
item.description: codenism@gmail.com + 425-200-4565 About Me My name is Kevin Sohn. My friends call me Min. Wearing a both SRE and Release Manager title, my position was to be a collaborator within cross-functional teams. I was excited to be the point-of-contact to take the projects from zero to 1, initializing different projects such as CI/CD pipeline, cloud infrastructures, containerization and infrastructure-as-code approach. Areas of Expertise Kubernetes | Containers Infrastructure-as-Code | Pulumi GitHub Actions | Jenkins | Groovy Jira | Confluence | KPI management AWS | GCP | OCI QA Automation | Selenium | Robot Framework Postman | Newman Audio Signal Processing (DSP) Post Processing and Audio Editing Korean | English fluent Professional Experience > Center ID Site Reliability Engineer | Release Manager 2020.
